page.title: 05RECREATION
page.content:
RECREATION THESE SPORTS ARE AVAILABLE AT GORDANO SPORTS CENTRE. SQUASH,BADMINTON,BASKET BALL,VOLLEY BALL,5 A SIDE FOOTBALL,INDOOR HOCKEY, TABLE TENNIS AND LOTS MORE. YOU CAN HIRE THE SPORTS HALL Â£10.00 AN HOUR,JUNIORS PAY Â£6.00. AND OTHER SPORTS ARE Â£1.50 JUNIORS, ADULT Â£2.50 AN HOUR. SQUASH. YOU ONLY GET FORTY MINUTES FOR THE SAME PRICE.
THE SCHOOL HAS HAD A SPORTS HALL FOR A LONG TIME BUT NO SPORTS CENTRE. THE GORDANO SCHOOL ASSOCIATION MADE THE FIRST PROPOSAL AND THE SCHOOL GOVERNORS APPROVED THE IDEA.AVON COUNTY COUNCIL AND WOODSPRING DISTRICT COUNCIL MADE THE FINAL DECISION. .
